title: EPISTOLA H. P. Mann
html:
EPISTOLA H. P. Mann

Mr. Davidson's observations on the Scottishness of Chambers 20th Century Dictionary [XV,1] bear out my own formed over sixteen years of using one. An odd sidelight on this came a few days after reading the article. Definitions under pet end with “Petting Party (coll.) a gathering for the purpose of caressing as an organised sport. (Origin unknown; not from Gaelic)” I think it hardly fanciful to discern a note of Calvinist disapproval in this curt disclaimer.

[H. P. Mann, Faversham, Kent]
